programme.title: Boys Over Flowers

programme.desc: Jun-pyo begs for Jan Di to advise him not to get married.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Jun-pyo tells Jan Di that he'll protect her, but to Jun-pyo's surprise, she says that she does not want to be cosseted or taken care of.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers

programme.desc: Jan Di dashes to the hospital after being informed that Jun Pyo had been in an accident.
